name: Ai Apaec
description:
AI APAEC

*Zoom out to play in (16:9 aspect ratio - 1920:1080)* 

Learn something about the culture of the "Mochicas", a Peruvian culture before Incaic times. The sun is missing, help the hero "Ai Apaec" in this short (but not yet finished) adventure. With the help of characters battle through your way.

(Loosely )Based on a tale from a Mochica vase. Check the source

Made for the Cultural Heritage Game Jam

Disclaimer: This is the first version of the game if you find any bugs let me know. Also, this is just the beginning of the history (due to time) but the second update will add the final conclusion of this tale.

Development / Design / Illustration

Satoshi Waku - @satoshi.waku

Music and FX by:
